subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The Formula One chief executive, for the first time called on Max Mosley to quit as president of the Paris-based Federation Internationale de l’Automobile rather than be forced out over a sex scandal.
snippet: The Formula One chief executive, for the first time called on Max Mosley to quit as president of the Paris-based Federation Internationale de l’Automobile rather than be forced out over a sex scandal.
